name: RI_1_1_23_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Legal_Hold_Event
title: RI.1.1.23.1 Evidence of Record Entry Legal Hold Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Legal Hold Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Legal Hold Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD audit each occurrence when a set of Record Entries are placed on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the organization where Record Entries are placed on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the patient who is subject of Record Entries placed on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the identifier for the set of Record Entries placed on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the user placing Record Entries on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the system application which placed Record Entries on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., placed on legal hold).

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the date and time Record Entries are placed on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) from which Record Entries are placed on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#10
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) in which Record Entries on legal hold are placed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#11
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for placing Record Entries on legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.23.1#12
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the data, document or other identifier for Record Entries placed on legal hold.
